title: Episode #197: Swish and Flick
description:
• We attempt to guess which book was the Most Banned/Challenged of the decade.
  • When can we expect the Deathly Hallows trailer to be released?
  • Will WB aim for a PG-13 rating?
  • Our thoughts on a LEGO: Harry Potter Collectorâ€™s Edition.
  • A Harry Potter visitor attraction is approved at Leavesden and we give our take.
  • MuggleCast interviews Warwick Davis in celebration of his new book Size Matters Not.
  • We talk about his time on the Harry Potter set, his favorite book, his favorite memories, and his career outside of Potter.
  • Chapter by Chapter: Chapters 18 and 19 of Prisoner of Azkaban.
  • Why did the trio find it so hard to believe Pettigrew was an animagus?
  • How did Dumbledore never once spot the group of animagus friends?
  • We look at how Dumbledore really believes in taking risks.
  • Snape is one grumpy man in this chapter. Is it truly because of the childhood grudge?
  • Why should Harry be the only one who decides whether Pettigrew lives or dies? The others had valid reasons to kill him.
  • An abbreviated MuggleMail segment looks at your feedback.
  • Chicken Soup for the MuggleCast Soul: Mother and Daughter edition.
  • MuggleCast Episode 198 will be released on May 12th.
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
